meanings.definition: Not drying or capable of drying.
meanings.sent1: The nondrying paint stayed wet for a long time.
meanings.sent2: She used a nondrying lotion to keep her skin moisturized.
meanings.sent3: The nondrying towel seemed to enjoy staying damp.
meanings.sent4: His nondrying humor kept the conversation lively.
meanings.sent5: The nondrying clay was perfect for sculpting intricate details.

meanings.definition: Not causing something to become dry.
meanings.sent1: The nondrying weather kept the soil moist and fertile.
meanings.sent2: The nondrying soap left her hands feeling soft and smooth.
meanings.sent3: The nondrying sponge seemed to have a secret to staying moist.
meanings.sent4: Her nondrying kindness brought warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The nondrying fabric retained its vibrant color wash after wash.
